article:
In dentistry, 'precision attachments' are the functional mechanical parts of the
removable partial denture made of plastic, metal or a combination of both. They
consist of two parts referred as the 'male' part that is fixed to a crown inside
the patient's mouth and a 'female' part which holds the partial denture. The
patient can insert and remove the partial dentures and the aim of the precision
attachment is to give the patient maximum comfort and ease while wearing,
inserting or removing.

'td.mrt Precision attachments'
